A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I never thought I would ever find myself here. Star Wars has been there for when I had a bad day\, had a huge test\, been down\, etc. The Ladt Jedi tried to be successful in changing Star Wars; however\, it abstracted the franchise so far it was unrecognizable. The story did not flow and had obvious points in it that did not make sense. In a world so stricken with being politically correct\, we turn to entertainment to escape politics. I rather enjoy explosions\, pew pews\, and daring chances than being told that is rash\, stupid\, and a male ego problem. For a movie and new franchise so set on killing the past\, the ending results with everything going back to being the same\, which begs the question why the story was portrayed in that fashion\, and prequels being created about past characters that we did not ask.
